robotcore
Interface State

All Known Implementing Classes:
States
public interface State

An interface for the states, all states should implement these 3 methods The run method should actually have a check in a sort of while loop to make sure that there is no interrupt needed

Author:
Peter Henderson

Method Summary
 void interrupt()
          For extra cases
 State next()
          This runs the main point of the state
 void onEnter()
          This sets up the state
 void onExit()
          This runs some cleanup
